function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases due to non-pharmaceutical interventions","Impact":"Increased spread of diseases and potential for outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement strict monitoring and enforcement of non-pharmaceutical interventions","Technologies":"Monitoring and surveillance systems, contact tracing apps","People":"General population in affected countries","Owner":"Local and national health authorities"},{"Description":"Inaccurate estimation of reproduction number due to prior assumptions","Impact":"Misleading predictions and inefficient resource allocation","Mitigation":"Regular validation and adjustment of prior assumptions based on observed data","Technologies":"Data analytics and machine learning models","People":"Epidemiologists, data scientists","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate preparation for initial seeding of infections","Impact":"Risk of delayed response and uncontrolled initial outbreaks","Mitigation":"Early detection and rapid response to emerging infections, stockpiling of medical supplies","Technologies":"Early warning systems, diagnostic testing, supply chain management","People":"Public health officials, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations"}]}
